Im a student doing A levels, and for coursework I can choose any 
issue or period of history from the last 1000 years provided there 
is some controversy over a specific issue.  Id quite like to do it 
on something from japanese history, but am a complete newcomer.  
Could anyone recommend any single incident/series of events that 
would be good or practical to research?
